title: Kalista seriously needs a new passive...
body: The current one just has too little counterplay, rest of the kit is good but the passive is just way too hard to deal with.

replies.body:
her passive is what makes her unique, why would you remove that? the only time it has "no counterplay" is if you're trying to chase her with a mellee/short ranged champ with no hard cc/speed up/dash, and you shouldnt be chasing her anyway. Kallista is easily countered by any point and click hard cc, such as: {{champion:127}} ,{{champion:4}} ,{{champion:44}}  or any champ with multiple dashes/gapclosers, like: {{champion:103}} ,{{champion:84}} ,{{champion:39}} ,{{champion:64}} ,{{champion:238}} to name afew.
 the thing i dont like is the infinitely stacking rend, which can mess up your {{summoner:11}} if she times badly, and makes any tank obsolete, it doesnt matter if you have 4k hp +400 armor when you get hit with infinite potential damage.

I don't see anything unique about a vayne q every time you auto attack, and even still yes uniqueness is good but it needs to be within  reason, I believe that yes their should be counters but kalista is just way too uncounterable except for a select few of champions, she doesn't have enough counterplay, And as for irelia and lee their dashes aren't really up enough and won't be able to kill kali if they're not fed enough and zed would have to be crazy fed because all kali would have to do is q flash then kite with the passive. And as for Ahri, she'd have to lane her E and with kali constantly dashing it'd be almost impossible.

You played melee singed and you main singed. You are not supposed to chase Kalista if you are doing that she can kite you like hell. I main Kali too, 60 percent winrate. I feel Jinx is better in everyway when compared to Kali except when dodging skillshots. 

Kali is little Op when she goes ham on melee, but as mentioned by MATUTINUS any kind of CC will easily wreck her to shreds. She is insanely squishy. So CC her and one shot her, game over.

You are playing on low Bronze, so people are still learning how to tackle her in that elo. DON'T CHASE KALI IF YOU CAN'T CC HER. End of story.

Good Luck. :)

I have rarely seen good Kali players in this low bronze elo. So your bot lane feeds Kali early and her power increases dramatically like Kat. Don't feed Kali early game. Also in the hands of any good ADC player Kali can be played decently and efficiently.

I still don't think she is OP, she is just annoying to deal with. She can be easily locked and shut down easily. I rarely seen good kali players in Silver elo.

Dude, you're just whining at this point. Seriously you've already been told that she is countered by hard cc and has powerful snowball potential... So does Katarina, and Yi, and Fiora, and Draven... This stuff happens, she has counter-play as long as you don't play like a dumbass. Of course in bronze most Kali players will be bronze as well (duh) and won't play smart enough to NEED countering. Hell the other day I ran into a Kali who I lanned against and she didn't use her passive ONCE.
For a long time she had an extremely low winrate :|

I find that compared to other adc, aside from one or two like vayne, she is so focused on auto attacks its pretty easy to deal with her. She doesn't have silly long range like cait either, so has to be fairly in your face to actually hurt you.
Oh course like other mentioned, like a katarina and other late game carries, don't feed her early, otherwise she will have a midgame spike in damage and kiteyness that's hard to deal with.
Easiest way to deal with her? Play rammus, e,w laugh. If you have someone with you its even easier.
Sure some can play against her but there are too many that can't.
If Kalista has no counterplay then neither does Malphite or Thresh... Seeing the problem here?
A fair nerf would be to remove the %25 more when lunging backwards as it's unnecessary...
